alert.note: Alert for Brazos; Burleson; Grimes; Houston; Madison; Washington (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 03 at 3:57PM CST until February 04 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy mixed precipitation. Additional ice accumulations of up to a tenth of an inch possible. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 5 above zero. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Texas. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until midnight CST tonight. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 9 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. For more information from the National Weather Service visit https://weather.gov/houston For the latest road conditions for Texas visit https://drivetexas.org
